name: City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania
name_original: City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania
description:
Have you always wanted to learn to park, drifting, driving skill and master in the city car parking game test in US city? City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania is here to bring you the most impressive and super city car parking pro game out there! Here you will be able to drive sports & expensive cars as well as park a wide variety of cars from all over the world. Your only purpose here is to focus on reaching your challenging destination and improving your driving skills & win the parking tournament to become a champion in 2017 in Parking Sim 3D!

Each one of your cars will have multiple upgrade options. Not only can you upgrade the engine, but you can also upgrade the brakes and speed in this super crazy parking adventure. What you get in the end is a very robust, one of a kind modern experience focused on helping you 3d speed car parking.

Once you enter the game, you will be able to roam around in a massive, visually impressive game world having multi-story parking plaza, gas stations, shopping stores, hospitals, shopping malls and much more. Each new location comes with its expensive 4x4 car park challenges in 2017, and you will have to use the steering wheel and acceleration pedal pretty much like in real life. You even have the ability to drive in reverse if you get stuck.

This makes City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania incredible for people that are just getting their driver’s license and want to test their capabilities. Aside from that, you also get immediate access to some rather incredible professional extreme dedicated features. City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania focuses a lot on the racing car park and fast and furious drive as well. Racing Car Park is a true challenge in this game, but it can be amazing at times if you choose to do it in a proper manner.

Plus, you get to customize the mirrors, spoilers, rings and even the car color if you want. This way you can quickly put a mark on that vehicle and call it yours.City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania is focused on realism, and it can provide you with hours upon hours of entertainment. It’s the ultimate driving game, a racing game and parking game, all of that included in a wonderful and distinct package. If you are a fan of driving, you will love the great attention to detail offered by the game.

Included in City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania, you can find 104 levels that will help you test your capabilities and improve them as you see fit. Plus, you always have daily tasks that will help you enjoy some outstanding bonuses on a daily basis. Complete each task and level without hitting the obstacles and barriers; then you will be able to earn in-game cash. This can be used to spend on cars and upgrades.

Don’t hesitate and embark in the ultimate driving and parking experience. Explore a fantastic, 3D game world and enjoy a fun car gameplay, only with City Car Parking Pro: Learn Driving Mania!

Locations:
• Gas Station
• Shopping Malls Lot
• Multi-Story parking plaza
• Hospital Lot Jam
• Street car park
• Roof Top car park

Features:
• More than 104 levels
• Complete daily tasks
• Upgrade the engine, brakes, and speed
• Customize mirrors, spoilers, rings, and colors
• 10 racing cards
